title: 48. "Filters" 5 Ways Codependency Affects How You See Others
description:
Hey girl!

In this episode, we talk about people-pleasing. Where does people-pleasing originate from? What are some of the signs? What can you do about it? We cover all this and much more!

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Check out https://trybetterhelp.com/selflovefix to save 10% on your first month of online therapy/counseling through better help professional counseling (Sponsored by Betterhelp).

Click here to order your copy of the Inner Child Healing Affirmations and Guided Meditations combo pack

***10% of proceeds from Inner Child Healing Affirmations & Guided Meditations purchases from March 18 2020- April 1 2020 goes to the Sacramento Food Bank to help provide meals to families during this difficult COVID-19 Quarantine Time****

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
